parameters.name: CreateSchema
parameters.description: True to create DimXpert schema if it does not already exist; false otherwise

title: IConfiguration.DimXpertManager
description: Gets the DimXpert schema for this configuration.

parameters.name: CreateSchema
parameters.description: True to create DimXpert schema if it does not already exist; false otherwise

remarks: This interface retrieves the DimXpert schema information for opened parts which can be accessed in SOLIDWORKS via either the DimXpertManager tab of the Management Panel or the DimXpert tab of the CommandManager.
